popularItems.name: Thai Soup
popularItems.composition: Authentic, bold, and delicious Thai flavors make this soup irresistible! This is the best Thai coconut soup I've had. You won't be disappointed with this one! Serve over steamed rice.

menu.name: Margarita
menu.composition: The Margarita pizza is a classic Italian dish made with a crispy crust, topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil. This simple yet delicious pizza is perfect for those looking for a taste of Italy in every bite. Enjoy this classic pizza on its own or customize it with your choice of toppings.

menu.name: Veggie Delight
menu.composition: The Veggie Delight pizza is a flavorful and healthy option, made with a gluten-free crust and topped with a variety of fresh vegetables including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and cherry tomatoes. The pizza is finished with a sprinkle of feta cheese and a drizzle of olive oil.

menu.name: Pepperoni Inferno
menu.composition: The Pepperoni Inferno pizza is not for the faint of heart! This spicy pie is loaded with spicy pepperoni, jalapeno peppers, and a spicy tomato sauce. The pizza is finished with a generous helping of melted mozzarella cheese and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes for an extra kick.

menu.name: Meat Lovers
menu.composition: The Meat Lovers pizza is a carnivore's dream, with a generous helping of pepperoni, sausage, ham, and bacon. This pizza is sure to satisfy even the heartiest of appetites and is finished with a layer of melted mozzarella cheese.

menu.name: Eggplant Parmesan
menu.composition: The Eggplant Parmesan pizza is a delicious vegetarian option, made with a thin crust and topped with sliced eggplant, marinara sauce, and mozzarella cheese. The pizza is finished with a sprinkle of parmesan cheese and a sprinkle of fresh basil.

menu.name: Vegan Delight
menu.composition: The Vegan Delight pizza is a plant-based option made with a vegan crust and topped with marinara sauce, roasted vegetables, and vegan cheese. This pizza is a tasty and satisfying option for those following a vegan diet.

menu.name: Gluten-Free BBQ Chicken
menu.composition: The Gluten-Free BBQ Chicken pizza is a delicious and gluten-free option, made with a gluten-free crust and topped with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, onions, and mozzarella cheese. The pizza is finished with a sprinkle of cilantro for a fresh and flavorful twist.

menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.composition: The Greek Salad pizza is a unique twist on a classic salad, made with a thin crust and topped with tomato sauce, feta cheese, olives, red onions, and bell peppers. The pizza is finished with a drizzle of olive oil and a sprinkle of fresh basil.

menu.name: Hawaiian
menu.composition: The Hawaiian pizza is a tropical twist on a classic, made with a crispy crust and topped with tomato sauce, pineapple, ham, and mozzarella cheese. This pizza is a sweet and savory combination that is sure to be a hit with everyone.

menu.name: Mushroom and Truffle Oil
menu.composition: The Mushroom and Truffle Oil pizza is a sophisticated and flavorful option, made with a thin crust and topped with a variety of mushrooms, truffle oil, and a sprinkle of parmesan cheese. This pizza is perfect for those looking for something a little more gourmet.

menu.name: Roasted Vegetable
menu.composition: The Roasted Vegetable pizza is a healthy and delicious option, made with a thin crust and topped with roasted vegetables, pesto sauce, and a sprinkle of feta cheese. This pizza is a great choice for those looking for a lighter option.

menu.name: Black Bean Burger
menu.composition: The Black Bean Burger is a vegetarian option made with a black bean patty, topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and avocado. The burger is served on a toasted bun with a side of chips.

menu.name: Bison Burger
menu.composition: The Bison Burger is a hearty and flavorful option made with a bison patty, topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheddar cheese. The burger is served on a gluten-free bun with a side of sweet potato fries.

menu.name: Jalapeno Burger
menu.composition: The Jalapeno Burger is a spicy option made with a beef patty, topped with jalapeno peppers, pepper jack cheese, and a spicy mayo sauce. The burger is served on a toasted bun with a side of fries.

menu.name: Double Cheeseburger
menu.composition: The Double Cheeseburger is a classic option made with two beef patties, topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and two slices of cheese. The burger is served on a toasted bun with a side of fries.

menu.name: Portobello Mushroom Burger
menu.composition: The Portobello Mushroom Burger is a vegetarian option made with a grilled portobello mushroom, topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and avocado. The burger is served on a toasted bun with a side of sweet potato fries.

menu.name: Vegan Burger
menu.composition: The Vegan Burger is a plant-based option made with a vegan patty, topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and vegan cheese. The burger is served on a toasted bun with a side of chips.

menu.name: Turkey Burger
menu.composition: The Turkey Burger is a healthy option made with a turkey patty, topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, and avocado. The burger is served on a gluten-free bun with a side of sweet potato fries.

menu.name: Veggie Delight
menu.composition: The Veggie Delight sub-sandwich is a flavorful and healthy option, made with a variety of fresh vegetables including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and cherry tomatoes. The sandwich is finished with a sprinkle of feta cheese and a drizzle of olive oil.

menu.name: Italian Cold Cut
menu.composition: The Italian Cold Cut sub-sandwich is a classic option made with a variety of Italian meats including salami, ham, and pepperoni. The sandwich is finished with lettuce, tomato, onion, and a drizzle of Italian dressing.

menu.name: Eggplant Parmesan
menu.composition: The Eggplant Parmesan sub-sandwich is a delicious vegetarian option, made with sliced eggplant, marinara sauce, and mozzarella cheese. The sandwich is finished with a sprinkle of parmesan cheese and a sprinkle of fresh basil.

menu.name: Vegan Delight
menu.composition: The Vegan Delight sub-sandwich is a plant-based option made with roasted vegetables, vegan cheese, and a variety of greens. The sandwich is finished with a drizzle of vegan mayo and a sprinkle of herbs.

menu.name: Gluten-Free BBQ Chicken
menu.composition: The Gluten-Free BBQ Chicken sub-sandwich is a delicious and gluten-free option, made with grilled chicken, BBQ sauce, onions, and a sprinkle of cilantro. The sandwich is served on a gluten-free bun with a side of chips.

menu.name: Veggie Lo Mein
menu.composition: The Veggie Lo Mein is a flavorful and healthy option made with a variety of fresh vegetables including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and broccoli. The noodles are tossed in a savory sauce and served with a side of steamed rice.

menu.name: Beef and Broccoli
menu.composition: The Beef and Broccoli noodles are a classic and hearty option made with tender slices of beef and fresh broccoli florets. The noodles are tossed in a savory sauce and served with a side of steamed rice.

menu.name: Thai Peanut Noodles
menu.composition: The Thai Peanut Noodles are a flavorful and unique option made with thin rice noodles and a variety of vegetables. The noodles are tossed in a creamy peanut sauce and served with a side of steamed rice.

menu.name: Vegan Pad Thai
menu.composition: The Vegan Pad Thai noodles are a plant-based and flavorful option made with thin rice noodles and a variety of vegetables. The noodles are tossed in a savory and sweet sauce and served with a side of steamed rice.

menu.name: Gluten-Free Sesame Noodles
menu.composition: The Gluten-Free Sesame Noodles are a delicious and gluten-free option made with thin rice noodles and a variety of vegetables. The noodles are tossed in a savory sesame sauce and served with a side of steamed rice.

menu.name: Veggie Chowmein
menu.composition: The Veggie Chowmein is a flavorful and healthy option made with a variety of fresh vegetables including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and broccoli. The noodles are stir-fried in a savory sauce and served with a side of steamed rice.

menu.name: Beef Chowmein
menu.composition: The Beef Chowmein is a hearty and flavorful option made with tender slices of beef and fresh vegetables. The noodles are stir-fried in a savory sauce and served with a side of steamed rice.

menu.name: Tofu Chowmein
menu.composition: The Tofu Chowmein is a vegetarian and protein-packed option made with tofu and a variety of vegetables. The noodles are stir-fried in a savory sauce and served with a side of steamed rice.
